mapper.insert: INSERT INTO buypj (title, content, link, types, project_id, maker_id, buyer_id) VALUES (#{title},#{content},#{link},#{types},#{project_id},#{maker_id},#{buyer_id});
mapper.select: SELECT title, content, link, types, buyer_id FROM buypj WHERE buyer_id = #{buyer_id};
SELECT title, content, link, types, buyer_id FROM buypj;
SELECT title, content, link, types, buyer_id FROM buypj WHERE id = #{id};
